name: Red Hood (BanceDev)
description:
A fast-paced top down hack n' slash game for the GamesPlusJam 2022. Enter the dungeon as Red Hood and try to take down as many enemies as possible before they get you, the only catch is each time you get a kill the enemies will mix up their type. 

Each time you die go back for more action and keep improving your high score.

Tutorial:

Click to perform a dash to your cursor, attacking any enemies in your path. (Tip: Click behind the enemy to slice through it, clicking on it may cause you to stop early and not get the kill.)

ESC to pause/resume the game and to close the credits screen.

Enemy Types:

Bat: Fires a projectile at the player but never will approach into melee range.

Wolf Mutant: Slow moving and only attacks within melee range but attacks multiple times quickly if you don't escape.

Slime: Melee only but has a 1/3 chance of splitting into two smaller slimes.

Credits in game. Mac and PC builds available.

Please check out my first commercial release CHASM coming this spring.
